articles.author: James Angelos, Nette Nöstlinger
articles.title: Biden and Scholz vow to keep up Ukraine aid as prospect of Trump victory looms - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The U.S. president’s visit to Berlin comes at a time of particular peril for Kyiv.
articles.content: Joe Biden took office nearly four years ago with a promise to mend Americas relationship with Europe after years of strained ties during the Trump administration. Trump frequently targeted Germany in… [+1158 chars]
